name: fin-model
description: FinVision is a comprehensive web-based financial modeling and analysis platform that transforms static Excel financial models into dynamic, interactive dashboards with real-time parameter adjustment capabilities.

scripts.build:tokens: style-dictionary build --config config/style-dictionary.json && cp dist/tokens/json/tokens.json frontend/src/design-system/tokens.json && npm --prefix frontend run gen:tokens && npx --prefix frontend tsx scripts/generate-tailwind-config.ts
